summary: I am a highly motivated Full Stack Developer with a solid foundation in ASP.NET Core and modern front-end technologies. I specialize in both Back-End development using .NET Core MVC and Front-End development with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and React. With hands-on experience in API integration, database management, and user interface development, I am eager to contribute to a dynamic team and bring innovative solutions to life.

description: Developed back-end services using ASP.NET Core and Entity Framework Core.
Integrated database functionality using LINQ, and created APIs to streamline data access.
Built a complete website using ASP.NET Core MVC, integrating databases with Entity Framework Core.
Designed the front-end using HTML, CSS (Bootstrap), and ASP.NET Razor pages.
Created a single-page application (SPA) with Angular, focusing on modularity, reusability, and performance.
Employed component-based architecture with Angular's Standalone Services for seamless front-end interaction.
Developed the back-end using ASP.NET Core and front-end with Angular, enabling efficient data handling and user interaction.
Implemented API connections and database interactions using Entity Framework Core.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science - Software Engineering

trainingCourses.name: Back-End API Development with ASP.NET Core
